thread.title: 18 die in India bus crash
thread.title_full: 18 die in India bus crash | News24

author: news24.com
title: 18 die in India bus crash
text:
Shimla - A speeding bus on Tuesday swerved off a mountain road into a deep gorge in the Himalayan region of northern India, killing at least 18 people, police said.
Another 15 people were injured, three of them seriously, in the accident which occurred near Nathpa, about 175km from Shimla, the state capital of Himachal Pradesh.
"15 people died on the spot and three on their way to the hospital," police superintendent Rahul Nath told AFP over phone.
"The bodies have been pulled out of the gorge and have been identified. The autopsy is being carried out on the spot and bodies are being handed over to their families," he said.
